A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Very disappointing. This is not a great film at all that is quite worthy of being lumped in with the prequels. To be blunt: It's like someone pulled some poorly written fan fiction off of a blog and used that to script a movie.

Contrived\, predictable\, and disjointed best describe the movie; the only thing missing from this movie that could have made it worse would be an appearance by Jar Jar Binks.

Unless you are a die hard Star Wars fan (like me) I recommend avoiding the cinema and waiting for the home video release.
